title: Bloomberg Markets: Barrack Offers Weinstein Financial Lifeline
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Barrack Offers Weinstein Financial Lifeline
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Chris Palmeri\u0010Los Angeles Bureau Chief \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing Weinstein Co. entering talks with Billionaire investor Tom Barrack's Colony Capital on sale of movie and television assets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
